Summary: Glowing orange line, with small colored lights under for a short time. Moving west slowly toward Kirksey Ky.
divs: sighting detailsgoing to the store at 3:50am north on dorin rd looking west i saw an orange line in the sky above the tree line, about 3\4 mile of a mile away. appearing odd, it tilted slightly, and i saw small colored lights under the glowing orange line. i pulled over at the intersection of i94 & dorin rd & watched the continuous orange shape fade slightly and re-illuminate as it moved westerly across i94 toward kiksey ky., for less than a minute. normally i have my cell phone, bot this time i unfortunately was charging it. it would of probably been appeared as an orange line in a sea of black.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Murray
There were no other sightings in Murray on or around March 5th 2012
